momi-chronicles.notes: Desktop Godot game - no server, no port. Testing via AutoBot (F1) and UITester (F2).

infrastructure.notes: Self-contained Godot project. Save system uses JSON files (user://save.dat). No external dependencies.

code_style.constants: ALL_CAPS with type annotations and ## doc comments
code_style.null_safety: is_instance_valid() for nodes, guard clauses with early return
code_style.signals: Events autoload signal bus, past-tense naming (player_damaged)

architecture.pattern: Component-based with autoload singletons, state machines, and signal bus

key_directories.characters/: Player, companions, enemies, NPCs with state machines
key_directories.components/: Reusable systems: health, hitbox, hurtbox, guard, state_machine, effects
key_directories.systems/: Game systems: inventory, equipment, party, shop
key_directories.ui/: HUD, menus, ring menu, shop UI
